trans-unit.source: Wraps a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object and delegates methods to that <see langword="Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 包裝 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件，並將方法委派 (Delegate) 給該 <see langword="Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Derive from this type and override only those members you have to provide customization in, plus any members that are required by your program and not already implemented by <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自這個型別，並覆寫您必須提供在中，自訂的成員再加上程式所需且尚未由任何成員<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator> derives from <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType> and implements most of the properties and methods of <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator> 衍生自<xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType>和大部分的屬性和方法會實作<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: For each member it implements, <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator> automatically delegates to the corresponding member of an internal <xref:System.Type> object, which is supplied as an argument to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 它會實作，每個成員<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>自動委派至內部的對應成員<xref:System.Type>物件，以建構函式的引數的形式提供。

trans-unit.source: This internal <xref:System.Type> object is exposed to deriving classes by the `protected`<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.typeImpl> field.
trans-unit.target: 這個內部<xref:System.Type>物件公開給衍生類別`protected`<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.typeImpl>欄位。

trans-unit.source: Some members of <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator> have implementations even though the members themselves are simply inherited from <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 某些成員<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>即使成員本身直接繼承自具有實作<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the implementation is provided by an overridden `protected` method that has a name that ends in "Impl".
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，提供的實作所覆寫`protected`方法結束於 」 Impl"中的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, the implementation for all overloads of the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.GetMethods%2A> method is supplied by the overridden <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.GetMethodImpl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，針對所有多載的實作<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.GetMethods%2A>提供方法的覆寫<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.GetMethodImpl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The implementation for inherited properties such as <xref:System.Type.IsPublic%2A> and <xref:System.Type.IsNestedAssembly%2A> is provided by the overridden <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.GetAttributeFlagsImpl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作繼承屬性例如<xref:System.Type.IsPublic%2A>和<xref:System.Type.IsNestedAssembly%2A>提供的覆寫<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.GetAttributeFlagsImpl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Deriving classes can provide a public constructor that takes a <xref:System.Type> object as its parameter and simply passes that object to the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.%23ctor%28System.Type%29> constructor, or can set the internal <xref:System.Type> object in some other way.
trans-unit.target: 衍生類別可以提供的公用建構函式採用<xref:System.Type>物件做為其參數，並只將物件加入該<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.%23ctor%28System.Type%29>建構函式，或者可以設定內部<xref:System.Type>以其他方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: If a deriving class uses a member that is not implemented by <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>, it must override that member and provide an implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果衍生的類別會使用不由實作成員<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>，則必須覆寫該成員，並提供實作。

trans-unit.source: The simplest implementation is to call the corresponding member on the internal <xref:System.Type> object exposed by the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.typeImpl> field, but you can provide any implementation your application requires.
trans-unit.target: 最簡單的實作會呼叫對應的成員上的內部<xref:System.Type>所公開物件<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.typeImpl>欄位，但您可以提供任何應用程式所需的實作。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to override these members if they are not used by your application or by library functions your application calls (for example, by the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference.%23ctor%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor).
trans-unit.target: 不需要覆寫這些成員，如果它們不會使用您的應用程式或程式庫函式應用程式呼叫 (例如，藉由<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference.%23ctor%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式)。

trans-unit.source: The following virtual methods (`Overridable` methods in Visual Basic) of <xref:System.Type> are not implemented by <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>: <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints%2A>, <xref:System.Type.MakeArrayType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.MakeByRefType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.MakePointerType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetEnumNames%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetEnumValues%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetTypeCodeImpl%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsEnumDefined%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsEquivalentTo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列虛擬方法 (`Overridable`方法，在 Visual Basic 中的) 的<xref:System.Type>未實作的<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>: <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>， <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>， <xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A>， <xref:System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints%2A>， <xref:System.Type.MakeArrayType%2A>， <xref:System.Type.MakeByRefType%2A>， <xref:System.Type.MakePointerType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetEnumNames%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetEnumValues%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetTypeCodeImpl%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsEnumDefined%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsEquivalentTo%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following virtual properties (`Overridable` properties in Visual Basic) of <xref:System.Type> are not implemented by <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A>, <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Type.DeclaringMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GenericParameterAttributes%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GenericParameterPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsSecurityCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列虛擬屬性 (`Overridable`屬性在 Visual Basic 中的) 的<xref:System.Type>未實作的<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator>: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>， <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A>， <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A>， <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>， <xref:System.Type.DeclaringMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Type.GenericParameterAttributes%2A>， <xref:System.Type.GenericParameterPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsSecurityCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that encapsulates the call to the method of an object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 類別的執行個體，會封裝對物件方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> class specifying the encapsulating instance.
trans-unit.target: 指定封裝執行個體來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called from a class to generate a delegate based upon the `Type` object for the class defining the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式從類別產生為基礎的委派呼叫`Type`定義方法的類別的物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delegatingType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegatingType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly of the implemented type.
trans-unit.target: 取得實作型別的組件 (assembly)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> object representing the assembly of the implemented type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 物件，表示實作型別的組件。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies are the deployment units in the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 組件是在 common language runtime 中的部署單位。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies establish the namespace for resolving requests and determine which resources are exposed externally and which are accessible from within the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件建立的命名空間解析要求，並決定哪些資源會公開外部、 哪些是可從組件內存取。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime can determine and locate the assembly for any running object.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime 可以判斷及找出任何執行中物件的組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly's fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得組件的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the assembly's fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，含有組件的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base type for the current type.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前型別的基底型別 (Base Type)。

trans-unit.source: The base type for a type.
trans-unit.target: 型別的基底型別。

trans-unit.source: The base type is the type from which this type directly inherits.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型是此類型直接繼承的型別。

trans-unit.source: Since the <xref:System.Object> class type is the ultimate base class of all the other types, it is the only type that does not have a base type.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Object>類別類型是所有其他類型的超基底類別，它是唯一沒有基底類型的類型。

trans-unit.source: In this case, `null` is returned as the base type of the `Object` type.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，`null`傳回基底型別`Object`型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified name of the implemented type.
trans-unit.target: 取得實作型別的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the type's fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含型別的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the fully qualified name of the current `TypeDelegator`.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含目前的完整的名稱`TypeDelegator`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes assigned to the <see langword="TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得指派給 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 的屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="TypeAttributes" /> object representing the implementation attribute flags.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="TypeAttributes" /> 物件，表示實作屬性旗標。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to determine if the `TypeDelegator` is abstract, public, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來判斷如果`TypeDelegator`是抽象、 public 等等。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Binder</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設 Binder。

trans-unit.source: The calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="Type" /> containing a list of the parameter number, order, and types.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Type" /> 型別的陣列包含參數數目、順序和型別的清單。

trans-unit.source: Types cannot be <see langword="null" />; use an appropriate <see langword="GetMethod" /> method or an empty array to search for a method without parameters.
trans-unit.target: 型別不能是 <see langword="null" />，請使用適當的 <see langword="GetMethod" /> 方法或空白陣列以搜尋沒有參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="ParameterModifier" /> having the same length as the <c>types</c> array, whose elements represent the attributes associated with the parameters of the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 類型 <see langword="ParameterModifier" /> 的陣列擁有的長度與 <c>types</c> 陣列相同，其項目表示與要取得方法之參數相關的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the constructor that implemented the <see langword="TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得實作 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="ConstructorInfo" /> object for the method that matches the specified criteria, or <see langword="null" /> if a match cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 方法的 <see langword="ConstructorInfo" /> 物件 (符合指定的準則)，或為 <see langword="null" /> (如果找不到符合的)。

trans-unit.source: The `callConvention` parameter indicates the calling convention for the entry point.
trans-unit.target: `callConvention`參數表示的進入點的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: If no calling convention is specified, a default <xref:System.Reflection.CallingConventions> value of `Standard` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有呼叫慣例會指定，預設值<xref:System.Reflection.CallingConventions>值`Standard`用。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> objects representing constructors defined for the type wrapped by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> 物件的陣列，表示為型別定義的建構函式，該型別由目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 所包裝。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="ConstructorInfo" /> containing the specified constructors defined for this class.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ConstructorInfo" /> 型別的陣列，包含為這個類別定義的指定建構函式。

trans-unit.source: If no constructors are defined, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義建構函式，則會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of a specified parameter, only public constructors or both public and non-public constructors will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定參數的值而定，只有公用建構函式、或者公用和非公用建構函式會被傳回。

trans-unit.source: Class initializers are available only through `GetMember`, `GetMembers`, `FindMembers`, and `GetConstructors`.
trans-unit.target: 類別初始設定式是只能透過`GetMember`， `GetMembers`， `FindMembers`，和`GetConstructors`。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the custom attributes defined for this type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回為這個類型定義的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this type's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜尋這個型別的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the custom attributes defined for this type, specifying whether to search the type's inheritance chain.
trans-unit.target: 傳回為這個型別定義的所有自訂屬性，指定是否搜尋型別的繼承 (Inheritance) 鏈結。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects containing all the custom attributes defined for this type.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列包含為這個型別定義的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: An array of custom attributes identified by type.
trans-unit.target: 由型別識別的自訂屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this type's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜尋這個型別的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of custom attributes identified by type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回由型別識別的自訂屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects containing the custom attributes defined in this type that match the <paramref name="attributeType" /> parameter, specifying whether to search the type's inheritance chain, or <see langword="null" /> if no custom attributes are defined on this type.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列包含這個型別中定義的自訂屬性，而這些屬性符合 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 參數，指定是否搜尋型別的繼承鏈結，或是如果這個型別上沒有定義自訂屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object encompassed or referred to by the current array, pointer or ByRef.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，由目前陣列、指標或 ByRef 所包含或參考。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object encompassed or referred to by the current array, pointer or <see langword="ByRef" />, or <see langword="null" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is not an array, a pointer or a <see langword="ByRef" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> (由目前的陣列、指標或 <see langword="ByRef" /> 所包含或參考)，或為 <see langword="null" /> (如果目前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 不是陣列、指標或 <see langword="ByRef" />)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的事件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified event.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> object representing the event declared or inherited by this type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 物件，表示這個型別以指定名稱宣告或繼承的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="null" /> if no such event is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到這類事件，則此方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If `bindingAttr` is <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>.`IgnoreCase`, the case of the `name` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`bindingAttr`是<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>。`IgnoreCase`、 案例的`name`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects representing all the public events declared or inherited by the current <see langword="TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 物件的陣列，表示由目前的 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 所宣告或繼承的公用事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects representing all the public events declared or inherited by the current <see langword="TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 物件的陣列，表示由目前的 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 所宣告或繼承的公用事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of type <see langword="EventInfo" /> containing all the events declared or inherited by the current type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="EventInfo" /> 型別的陣列，包含由目前型別所宣告或繼承的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: If there are no events, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何事件，則會傳回空白陣列。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the events specified in <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> that are declared or inherited by the current <see langword="TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中所指定的事件，由目前的 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 所宣告或繼承。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="EventInfo" /> containing the events specified in <paramref name="bindingAttr" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="EventInfo" /> 型別的陣列，包含 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中指定的事件。

trans-unit.source: If there are no events, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何事件，則會傳回空白陣列。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> object representing the field with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 物件，表示具有指定名稱的欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="FieldInfo" /> object representing the field declared or inherited by this <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="FieldInfo" /> 物件，表示這個 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 以指定名稱宣告或繼承的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if no such field is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到這種欄位，則會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use a `bindingAttr` of <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>.NonPublic to return all public and nonpublic fields.
trans-unit.target: 使用`bindingAttr`的<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>。NonPublic 傳回所有的公用和非公用欄位。

trans-unit.source: Use `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of the fields, as the search is case-sensitive by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase`來搜尋不區分大小寫，預設會忽略欄位的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects representing the data fields defined for the type wrapped by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 物件的陣列，表示為型別定義的資料欄位，該型別由目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 所包裝。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="FieldInfo" /> containing the fields declared or inherited by the current <see langword="TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="FieldInfo" /> 型別的陣列，包含由目前的 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 所宣告或繼承的欄位。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if there are no matched fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有符合的欄位，則傳回空白陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.GetFields%2A> method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.GetFields%2A>方法不會傳回欄位以特定順序，例如依字母順序排列或按宣告順序。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order can vary.
trans-unit.target: 您的程式碼必須依賴欄位會傳回的順序，因為該順序可能會有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Use a `bindingAttr` of <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>.NonPublic to return all public and nonpublic fields.
trans-unit.target: 使用`bindingAttr`的<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>。NonPublic 傳回所有的公用和非公用欄位。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the interface implemented by the current class.
trans-unit.target: 由目前類別所實作之介面的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the case is to be ignored; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略大小寫，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified interface implemented by the type wrapped by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回由型別實作的指定介面，該型別由目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 所包裝。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Type" /> object representing the interface implemented (directly or indirectly) by the current class with the fully qualified name matching the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Type" /> 物件，表示目前類別 (具有與指定名稱相符的完整名稱) 所實作 (直接或間接) 的介面。

trans-unit.source: If no interface that matches name is found, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到名稱相符的介面，則傳回 Null。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the interface to retrieve a mapping of.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取對應的介面的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an interface mapping for the specified interface type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定介面類型的介面對應。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping" /> object representing the interface mapping for <paramref name="interfaceType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping" /> 物件，表示 <paramref name="interfaceType" /> 的介面對應。

trans-unit.source: The interface map denotes how an interface is mapped into the actual methods on a class that implements that interface.
trans-unit.target: 介面對應代表介面如何對應到實作該介面的類別上的實際方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the interfaces implemented on the current class and its base classes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在目前類別和其基底類別 (Base Class) 上實作的所有介面。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="Type" /> containing all the interfaces implemented on the current class and its base classes.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Type" /> 型別的陣列，包含在目前類別和其基底類別上實作的所有介面。

trans-unit.source: If none are defined, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義，則會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: The type of members to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的成員型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns members (properties, methods, constructors, fields, events, and nested types) specified by the given <paramref name="name" />, <paramref name="type" />, and <paramref name="bindingAttr" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回成員 (屬性、方法、建構函式、欄位、事件和巢狀型別 (Nested Type))，由指定的 <paramref name="name" />、<paramref name="type" /> 和 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="MemberInfo" /> containing all the members of the current class and its base class meeting the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 型別的陣列，包含符合指定準則之目前類別和其基底類別的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: If `bindingAttr` is <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>.NonPublic, all the members will be considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果`bindingAttr`是<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>。NonPublic 會被視為所有成員。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matches, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相符的項目，則會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns members specified by <paramref name="bindingAttr" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回由 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 所指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="MemberInfo" /> containing all the members of the current class and its base classes that meet the <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> filter.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 型別的陣列，包含符合 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 篩選條件之目前類別和其基底類別的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: If `bindingAttr` is <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>.NonPublic, all the members will be considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果`bindingAttr`是<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>。NonPublic 會被視為所有成員。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matches, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相符的項目，則會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The method name.
trans-unit.target: 方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Binder</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設 Binder。

trans-unit.source: The calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="Type" /> containing a list of the parameter number, order, and types.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Type" /> 型別的陣列包含參數數目、順序和型別的清單。

trans-unit.source: Types cannot be <see langword="null" />; use an appropriate <see langword="GetMethod" /> method or an empty array to search for a method without parameters.
trans-unit.target: 型別不能是 <see langword="null" />，請使用適當的 <see langword="GetMethod" /> 方法或空白陣列以搜尋沒有參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="ParameterModifier" /> having the same length as the <c>types</c> array, whose elements represent the attributes associated with the parameters of the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 類型 <see langword="ParameterModifier" /> 的陣列擁有的長度與 <c>types</c> 陣列相同，其項目表示與要取得方法之參數相關的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified method whose parameters match the specified argument types and modifiers, using the specified binding constraints and the specified calling convention.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的繫結條件約束和指定的呼叫慣例，來搜尋指定的方法，而該方法的參數符合指定的引數類型和修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="MethodInfoInfo" /> object for the implementation method that matches the specified criteria, or <see langword="null" /> if a match cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的 <see langword="MethodInfoInfo" /> 物件 (符合指定的準則)，或為 <see langword="null" /> (如果找不到符合的)。

trans-unit.source: The `callConvention` parameter indicates the calling convention for the entry point.
trans-unit.target: `callConvention`參數表示的進入點的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Reflection.CallingConventions> is specified, a default `CallingConventions` value of `Standard` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Reflection.CallingConventions>指定，預設值`CallingConventions`值`Standard`用。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> objects representing specified methods of the type wrapped by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 物件的陣列，表示型別的指定方法，該型別由目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 所包裝。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see langword="MethodInfo" /> objects representing the methods defined on this <see langword="TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 物件的陣列，表示在這個 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 上定義的方法。

trans-unit.source: The nested type's name.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a nested type specified by <paramref name="name" /> and in <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> that are declared or inherited by the type represented by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回巢狀型別，由 <paramref name="name" /> 和 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中所指定，而且由目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 表示之型別所宣告或繼承。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Type" /> object representing the nested type.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Type" /> 物件，表示巢狀型別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the nested types specified in <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> that are declared or inherited by the type wrapped by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回型別 (由目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 所包裝) 所宣告或繼承指定在 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中的巢狀型別。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="Type" /> containing the nested types.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Type" /> 型別的陣列，包含巢狀型別。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> objects representing properties of the type wrapped by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 物件的陣列，表示型別的屬性，該型別由目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator" /> 所包裝。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see langword="PropertyInfo" /> objects representing properties defined on this <see langword="TypeDelegator" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="PropertyInfo" /> 物件的陣列，表示在這個 <see langword="TypeDelegator" /> 上定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask that affects the way in which the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，會影響搜尋的進行方式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a combination of zero or more bit flags from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是零或來自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 多個位元旗標的組合。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects via reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Binder</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設 Binder。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: A list of parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 參數型別的清單。

trans-unit.source: The list represents the number, order, and types of the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 表示參數數目、順序和型別的清單。

trans-unit.source: Types cannot be null; use an appropriate <see langword="GetMethod" /> method or an empty array to search for a method without parameters.
trans-unit.target: 型別不能是 Null，請使用適當的 <see langword="GetMethod" /> 方法或空白陣列以搜尋沒有參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of the same length as types with elements that represent the attributes associated with the parameters of the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 與具有元素型別相同長度的陣列，這些元素表示與要取得方法之參數相關的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the specified property whose parameters match the specified argument types and modifiers, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用指定的繫結條件約束搜尋指定的屬性，而該屬性的參數符合指定的引數類型和修飾詞的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> object for the property that matches the specified criteria, or null if a match cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 物件 (符合指定的準則)，或為 Null (如果找不到符合的)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID (globally unique identifier) of the implemented type.
trans-unit.target: 取得實作型別的 GUID (全域唯一識別項)。

trans-unit.source: A GUID.
trans-unit.target: GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID (globally unique identifier) is a 128-bit unique identification string used to identify a class or an interface.
trans-unit.target: GUID （全域唯一識別項） 是用來識別在類別或介面的 128 位元的唯一識別碼字串。

trans-unit.source: It is primarily useful for interoperability between the Microsoft .NET Framework and COM.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要適用於 Microsoft.NET Framework 和 COM 之間的互通性

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> encompasses or refers to another type; that is, whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array, a pointer or a ByRef.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否內含或參考其他型別，也就是說，目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否為陣列、指標或 ByRef。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array, a pointer or a ByRef; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是陣列、指標或 ByRef，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用之成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This may be a constructor, method, property, or field.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是建構函式、方法、屬性或欄位。

trans-unit.source: If an empty string ("") is passed, the default member is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳遞的是空字串 ("")，則會叫用預設成員。

trans-unit.source: The invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 引動過程屬性。

trans-unit.source: This must be one of the following <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="CreateInstance" />, <see langword="Static" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是下列其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="CreateInstance" />、<see langword="Static" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指定適當的引動過程屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a static member is to be invoked, the <see langword="Static" /> flag must be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果要叫用靜態 (Static) 成員，則必須設定 <see langword="Static" /> 旗標。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects via reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Binder</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設 Binder。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />。

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上叫用指定成員的物件。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="Object" /> that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Object" /> 型別的陣列，包含要叫用的成員參數的數目、順序和型別。

trans-unit.source: If <c>args</c> contains an uninitialized <see langword="Object" />, it is treated as empty, which, with the default binder, can be widened to 0, 0.0 or a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>args</c> 包含未初始化的 <see langword="Object" />，則會被視為具有預設繫結器的空字串，可被擴大為 0、0.0 或字串。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="ParameterModifer" /> that is the same length as <c>args</c>, with elements that represent the attributes associated with the arguments of the member to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 與 <c>args</c> 長度相同之類型 <see langword="ParameterModifer" /> 的陣列，與項目一起時，表示與要叫用之成員引數相關的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A parameter has attributes associated with it in the member's signature.
trans-unit.target: 參數在成員的簽章中具有與其相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For ByRef, use <see langword="ParameterModifer.ByRef" />, and for none, use <see langword="ParameterModifer.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對 ByRef 要使用 <see langword="ParameterModifer.ByRef" />，而 None 則要使用 <see langword="ParameterModifer.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The default binder does exact matching on these.
trans-unit.target: 預設繫結器確實與這些相符。

trans-unit.source: Attributes such as <see langword="In" /> and <see langword="InOut" /> are not used in binding, and can be viewed using <see langword="ParameterInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 (例如 <see langword="In" /> 和 <see langword="InOut" />) 不會用於繫結中，且可以使用 <see langword="ParameterInfo" /> 來檢視。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see langword="CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 的執行個體，用於管理類型的強制型轉。

trans-unit.source: This is necessary, for example, to convert a string that represents 1000 to a <see langword="Double" /> value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 例如，要將表示 1000 的字串轉換為 <see langword="Double" /> 值時，這是必要的，因為 1000 在不同文化特性 (Culture) 中有不同的表示方式。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> for the current thread's <see langword="CultureInfo" /> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>culture</c> 是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒之 <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 的 <see langword="CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="String" /> containing parameter names that match up, starting at element zero, with the <c>args</c> array.
trans-unit.target: 類型 <see langword="String" /> 的陣列，包含從項目零開始即與 <c>args</c> 陣列完全相符的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: There must be no holes in the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中不能有空白位置。

trans-unit.source: If <c>args</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>args</c>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Length" /> is greater than <c>namedParameters</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Length" /> 大於 <c>namedParameters</c>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Length" />, the remaining parameters are filled in order.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Length" />，則會依序填入其餘的參數。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 叫用指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: The method that is to be invoked must be accessible and provide the most specific match with the specified argument list, under the constraints of the specified binder and invocation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定繫結器和引動過程屬性的條件約束，所要叫用的方法必須可存取，並提供與指定引數清單最特定的符合項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Object" /> representing the return value of the invoked member.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Object" />，表示叫用之成員的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: A method will be invoked if both the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: 如果下列條件成立，就會叫用方法：

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list (unless default arguments are defined on the member).
trans-unit.target: （除非在成員上定義預設引數），方法宣告中的參數數目等於指定的引數清單中的引數數目。

trans-unit.source: The type of each arguments can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每個引數的型別可以轉換型別參數的繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The binder will find all the matching methods.
trans-unit.target: 繫結器會尋找所有相符的方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods are found based upon the type of binding requested (`BindingFlags.MethodInvoke`, `BindingFlags.GetProperties`, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 這些方法找到要求的繫結的類型為基礎 (`BindingFlags.MethodInvoke`，`BindingFlags.GetProperties`等等)。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder.
trans-unit.target: 方法的集合會依名稱、 引數數目和一組繫結器中所定義的搜尋修飾詞進行篩選。

trans-unit.source: After the method is selected, it will be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 選取方法之後，就會叫用。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility is checked at that point.
trans-unit.target: 協助工具會在該點檢查。

trans-unit.source: The search may control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋可能會控制哪一組方法會搜尋根據與方法相關聯的協助工具屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法負責選取方法被叫用。

trans-unit.source: The default binder selects the most specific match.
trans-unit.target: 預設繫結器選取最適合的相符項目。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任程式碼會忽略存取限制。

trans-unit.source: That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。

trans-unit.source: Currently, `InvokeMember` performs the Microsoft .NET Framework reflection semantics for every type of object.
trans-unit.target: 目前，`InvokeMember`執行 Microsoft.NET Framework 反映語意的每個類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the member specified by name is an array and the `BindingFlags.GetField` flag is set on `invokeAttr`, the `args` array specifies the elements whose values are to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果依名稱指定的成員為陣列和`BindingFlags.GetField`上設定旗標`invokeAttr`、`args`陣列指定其值要傳回的項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following call through `Type` object `t` returns the value of the first element of the string array MyArray, which is a member of the calling object:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列呼叫透過`Type`物件`t`傳回字串陣列 MyArray，呼叫物件的成員的第一個元素的值：

trans-unit.source: You can use `InvokeMember` to set one or more elements of a member array.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`InvokeMember`以設定成員陣列的一個或多個項目。

trans-unit.source: All elements are set to the same value.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目會設定為相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The `args` array must be formatted as follows:
trans-unit.target: `args`陣列必須格式化，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: For example, to set the first member of MyArray from the previous example, the syntax is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要從先前的範例設定 MyArray 的第一個成員，語法如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否為陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是陣列，則為 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The type to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type can be assigned to this type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的型別是否可以指派到這個型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified type can be assigned to this type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的類型可以指派到這個類型，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否由參照傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是以傳址方式傳遞，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否為 COM 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a COM object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是 COM 物件，則為 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this object represents a constructed generic type.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個物件是否表示建構的泛型類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object represents a constructed generic type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個物件代表建構的泛型類型，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this type's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜尋這個型別的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of custom attributes identified by type.
trans-unit.target: 由型別識別的自訂屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a custom attribute identified by <paramref name="attributeType" /> is defined.
trans-unit.target: 指出由 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 識別的自訂屬性是否定義。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a custom attribute identified by <paramref name="attributeType" /> is defined; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 所識別的自訂屬性已定義，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The custom attribute type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入自訂屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a pointer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否為指標。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a pointer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是指標，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is one of the primitive types.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否為其中一個基本型別 (Primitive Type)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is one of the primitive types; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是其中一個基本類型，則為 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the type is a value type; that is, not a class or an interface.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出型別是否為實值型別 (Value Type)，也就是說，不是類別或介面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type is a value type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別為實值型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies this entity in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，用於識別中繼資料 (Metadata) 中的這個實體 (Entity)。

trans-unit.source: A value which, in combination with the module, uniquely identifies this entity in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 此值與模組結合後，是唯一能識別中繼資料中的實體。

trans-unit.source: The tokens obtained using this property can be passed to the unmanaged reflection API.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性取得的權杖可以傳遞至 unmanaged 反映 API。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Unmanaged Reflection API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Unmanaged 反映 API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the module that contains the implemented type.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含實作型別的模組。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> object representing the module of the implemented type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> 物件，表示實作型別的模組。

trans-unit.source: A module is a loadable unit that can contain type declarations and implementations.
trans-unit.target: 模組已載入的單位可以包含型別宣告和實作。

trans-unit.source: Modules contain enough information to enable the common language runtime to locate all implementation bits when the module is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 模組包含足夠的資訊來啟用 common language runtime 在載入模組，請找出所有實作位元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the implemented type, with the path removed.
trans-unit.target: 取得實作型別的名稱 (路徑已移除)。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the type's non-qualified name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，含有型別的不完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the current `TypeDelegator`.
trans-unit.target: 包含目前 `TypeDelegator` 名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Only the simple name, not the fully qualified name, is returned.
trans-unit.target: 只有簡單名稱，不是完整限定名稱，會傳回。

trans-unit.source: To get the name and the path, use <xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.FullName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的名稱和路徑，請使用<xref:System.Reflection.TypeDelegator.FullName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace of the implemented type.
trans-unit.target: 取得實作型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the type's namespace.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" /> 包含型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: This property gets a string containing the namespace of the current `TypeDelegator`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取得字串，包含目前的命名空間`TypeDelegator`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `TypeDelegator` is <xref:System.Reflection.TypeFilter>, the returned namespace is <xref:System.Reflection>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`TypeDelegator`是<xref:System.Reflection.TypeFilter>，傳回的命名空間是<xref:System.Reflection>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the internal metadata representation of an implemented type.
trans-unit.target: 取得實作型別的內部中繼資料表示的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="RuntimeTypeHandle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="RuntimeTypeHandle" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A type handle is a unique integer value associated with each type.
trans-unit.target: 類型控制代碼是每個型別相關聯的唯一整數值。

trans-unit.source: The handle is unique during the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段控制代碼是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating type information.
trans-unit.target: 數值，表示型別資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the implemented type.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示實作型別的基礎 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 基礎類型。
